metadata.title: CVE-2021-4155 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS for NVIDIA BlueField (jammy) - medium
metadata.description:
A data leak flaw was found in the way XFS_IOC_ALLOCSP IOCTL in the XFSfilesystem allowed for size increase of files with unaligned size. A localattacker could use this flaw to leak data on the XFS filesystem otherwisenot accessible to them.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2021-4155` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-5.15.0-18-generic - 5.15.0-18.18
linux-image-5.15.0-18-generic-lpae - 5.15.0-18.18
linux-image-unsigned-5.15.0-18-generic - 5.15.0-18.18
linux-image-unsigned-5.15.0-18-generic-64k - 5.15.0-18.18
linux-image-unsigned-5.15.0-18-lowlatency - 5.15.0-18.18
No subscription required
